html:
{%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header, render_field, print_value, fieldmeta, get_width, get_align_class with context -%}

{% else%}
{% endif %}

Tax Invoice

{{ doc.customer }} GST Reg Number: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "tax_id") or "" }}
{%if doc.customer_address%}{% set address_doc = frappe.get_doc("Address", doc.customer_address) %}{{ address_doc.address_line1 or "" }}{% endif %} Tax Invoice Number: {{ doc.name or ""}}
{%if doc.customer_address%}{% set address_doc = frappe.get_doc("Address", doc.customer_address) %}{{ address_doc.city or "" }}, {{ address_doc.state or "" }}{% endif %} Customer Number: {{ doc.customer or ""}}
{%if doc.customer_address%}{% set address_doc = frappe.get_doc("Address", doc.customer_address) %}{{ address_doc.country or "" }} {{ address_doc.pincode or "" }}{% endif %} Date: {{ frappe.utils.getdate(doc.posting_date).strftime("%d %B %Y") or ""}}
Invoice Type: {{doc.custom_izzy_si_type or ''}}
{% for item in doc.items %} {% endfor %}
Description Quantity Unit Price Price
{{ item.item_code }} - {{ item.description }} {{item.qty}} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.rate, currency=doc.currency )}} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.amount, currency=doc.currency )}}

Please pay this invoice within 14 days
Payable in {{doc.currency}}

{{ frappe.format(doc.total, "Currency") }}

{{ frappe.format(doc.outstanding_amount, "Currency") }}
Amount Applied:
{{ frappe.format(doc.total_advance, "Currency") }}
Balance Due:
{{ frappe.format(doc.outstanding_amount, "Currency") }}

Payment Advice

By Cheque Please make cheques payable to 'IzzyAgents Ltd' and post to the address above. By Direct Credit Please make your payment to the following account:
Account Name: IzzyAgents Ltd
Account Number: 02-0278-0338401-000
By Direct Debit or Automatic Payment: Please contact us and we can arrange for the appropriate forms to be sent out.

Any amounts left unpaid after the due date will incur interest charges . Statements that remain unpaid will be referred to our collections department.
